Surface definitions.

Imports

pixels, properties, rect

Types

BlitMap {.final, incompletestruct, pure.} = object
Blit map. 
Surface {.bycopy, final, pure.} = object
  flags*: SurfaceFlags       ## Read-only.
  format*: ptr PixelFormat   ## Read-only.
  w*: cint                   ## Read-only.
  h*: cint                   ## Read-only.
  pitch*: cint               ## Read-only.
  pixels*: ptr UncheckedArray[byte] ## Read-write.
  ## Read-write.
  locked*: cint              ## Read-only.
  ## Private.
  clip_rect*: Rect           ## Read-only.
  ## Private.
  ## Read-mostly.

Surface.

Note:: This structure should be treated as read-only, except for pixels, which, if not nil , contains the raw pixel data for the surface.

SurfaceFlags = distinct uint32
Surface flags. 
SurfacePtr = ptr Surface
Surface. 
YuvConversionMode {.size: 4.} = enum
  YUV_CONVERSION_JPEG,      ## Full range JPEG.
  YUV_CONVERSION_BT601,     ## BT.601 (the default).
  YUV_CONVERSION_BT709,     ## BT.709.
  YUV_CONVERSION_AUTOMATIC   ## BT.601 for SD content, BT.709 for HD content.
The formula used for converting between YUV and RGB.

Consts

DONTFREE = 4'u
Surface is ref. internally. 
PREALLOC = 1'u
Surface uses prealloc. memory. 
RLEACCEL = 2'u
Surface is RLE encoded. 
SIMD_ALIGNED = 8'u
Surface uses aligned memory. 
SWSURFACE = 0'u
Just here for compatibility.
